text: Boris Oleynik (; 22 October 1935 â€“ 30 April 2017) was a Ukrainian poet, translator, and politician. He served on the Verkhovna Rada from 1992 to 2006. He was also a member of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine. He was a communist. He taught cultural and diplomatic studies at the Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv. Oleynik died on 30 April 2017 of heart failure in Kyiv, Ukraine, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Ukrainian writers Category:Ukrainian academics Category:Ukrainian diplomats Category:Ukrainian poets Category:European translators
title: Boris Oleynik
